Connect With Us

Amanda Harris

Director of Account Management

Amanda Harris is the director of account management for POLITICO Pro. She came to POLITICO from the Advisory Board Company, a health care research and consulting firm where she served as a relationship manager to hospitals and health systems across the country. She previously worked for the National Women’s Law Center as an outreach associate and the GAVI Alliance on its strategic marketing and communications team.

Harris graduated from Duke University in Durham, N.C., in 2008 and earned a Bachelor of Arts in English. She was a member of the university’s varsity fencing team. Harris has lived in the D.C. area for the past 5 years and now lives with her husband in Alexandria, Va.

Amanda Harris
AHarris@politico.com
(703) 842-1755

Contact Amanda Harris
